column3: Updated 768b695296e343da0163e07e25f08dfbc6f58e1d -> 8c85a48eac8a0a9512e754f29c173c2ce9e55308 ([`pr/names.1`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/names.1) -> [`pr/names.2`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/names.2), [compare](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/compare/pr/names.1..pr/names.2)) with tweaks to clean up and fix errors in dummy wallet and multiprocess builds

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23599](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23599) (Tidy up RPCTxSerializationFlags by MarcoFalke)
* [#23507](https:

In commit "Add src/node/* code to node:: namespace" (733a629696ef3350e5c9c861ae94254a06cc920b)\n\nNote: This line can be removed after #23499, since calling `node::BroadcastTransaction` from the bitcoin-gui process doesn't work in the multiprocess build (there is a segfault because the NodeContext pointer this tries to pass is null). This is a preexisting bug, independent of this PR.
Some lines in pull 23492 remove one of the two spaces elsewhere.\n

re: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23497#discussion_r748749959

> Some lines in pull 23492 remove one of the two spaces elsewhere.

Oops, I'm not sure if #23492 is related, but I did seem to misremember which convention we are using. Most of our code does use 1 space not 2 spaces before trailing namespace comments. The 2 space convention is from https://google.github.io/styleguide

re: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23497#discussion_r748578593

> Note: This line can be removed after #23499 

Removed this now that #23499 is merged.
